WITH RECURSIVE t1 AS ( -- 根评论（对帖子的直接评论） SELECT t2.comment_id, t2.user_id, t2.comment_content, t2.create_time, t2.like_number, t2.parent_id, t2.comment_id as root_id, -- 根评论的root_id就是自己 0 as level, CAST(t2.comment_id AS CHAR(255)) AS path FROM comment t2 WHERE t2.parent_id = #{postId} AND t2.comment_type = '0' -- 类型为字符'0' AND t2.del_flag = '0'
UNION ALL
-- 递归查询子评论 SELECT t3.comment_id, t3.user_id, t3.comment_content, t3.create_time, t3.like_number, t3.parent_id, t1.root_id, -- 继承根评论ID t1.level + 1 as level, CONCAT(t1.path, ',', t3.comment_id) AS path FROM comment t3 INNER JOIN t1 ON t3.parent_id = t1.comment_id -- 使用parent_id关联 WHERE t3.comment_type = '1' -- 子评论类型为'1' AND t3.del_flag = '0' )
SELECT t1.comment_id, t1.user_id, t1.comment_content, t1.create_time, t1.like_number, t4.nick_name, t4.avatar, t1.parent_id, -- 使用parent_id而不是reply_id t1.root_id, t1.level,
-- 被回复用户的昵称（通过parent_id关联获取） t5.nick_name as reply_nick_name,
-- 子评论数量 (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comment t6 WHERE t6.parent_id = t1.comment_id AND t6.comment_type = '1' AND t6.del_flag = '0') as child_number,
-- 排序路径 t1.path as sort_path,
-- 当前用户点赞状态（1-已点赞，0-未点赞） CASE WHEN t8.likes_id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as like_status
FROM t1 LEFT JOIN user t4 ON t1.user_id = t4.user_id -- 通过parent_id获取父评论，然后获取父评论的用户信息 LEFT JOIN comment t7 ON t1.parent_id = t7.comment_id -- 获取父评论 LEFT JOIN user t5 ON t7.user_id = t5.user_id -- 获取父评论用户的昵称 -- 关联点赞表，查询当前用户对每条评论的点赞状态 LEFT JOIN likes t8 ON t1.comment_id = t8.target_id AND t8.type = '1' -- 类型'1'表示评论 AND t8.del_flag = '0' AND t8.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY t1.root_id, t1.create_time, t1.level
